  • Constructor Details

    • CustomerController

      public CustomerController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Opens the Customer FXML Interface and configures Customer table. Fields are disabled at startup until a new customer is added or an existing customer is edited. Lambda: Creates a listener for when a Customer record is selected in the table to populate fields with Customer data. Confirms selection if a Customer is being added or edited before updating fields.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location of the Customer FXML file.
      resourceBundle - The Customer FXML file object.

    • clearFields

      public void clearFields()
      Erases the value in each field. Called after new clicked, or a successful save or deletion.

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the Customer window. Called after switching to the Home or Window appointments.

    • confirmSelect

      public void confirmSelect()
      Displays an Alert to confirm that the user wants to change the selectedCustomer and update Fields when a new Customer is selected in the Table. Lambda: Shows the Alert and uses response to determine if Fields should be updated or not.

    • disableFields

      public void disableFields()
      Disables all fields, except the ID field, which is disable by default and not enabled.

    • enableFields

      public void enableFields()
      Enables all fields, except the ID field, which should not be enabled per specifications.

    • getCustomerFields

      public Customer getCustomerFields() throws SQLException
      Pulls text entered into each input control in the form and returns a Customer object with that information.
      Returns:
      Returns a Customer based on the values entered into the fields.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception thrown if there is an error with the SQL Statement or parameters.

    • isFormComplete

      public boolean isFormComplete() throws SQLException
      Checks if each field has data entered.
      Returns:
      Returns false is any field is blank, otherwise true.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception thrown if errors in SQL Statement or parameters.

    • isEditInProcess

      public boolean isEditInProcess()
      Checks if a Customer record is currently being edited.
      Returns:
      Returns true if edit is in process; if not, returns false.

    • isNewInProcess

      public boolean isNewInProcess()
      Checks if a new Customer record is currently being entered.
      Returns:
      Returns true if a new Customer record is being entered; if not, returns false.

    • onAppointmentClicked

      public void onAppointmentClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Method called when the Appointment button is clicked. Opens the Appointment window and closes the Customer window.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Button clicked
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception if unable to locate or open Appointment file.

    • onCountrySelected

      public void onCountrySelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Called when the Country dropdown menu is selected. Pulls all regions associated with that country.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Dropdown menu selected with a country.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception if there is an error in the SQL Statement or Parameters.

    • onDeleteClicked

      public void onDeleteClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onEditClicked

      public void onEditClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      When edit button is clicked, all fields are enabled. Edit button is only visible when a Customer is selected. Fields will have already populated upon customer selection. Save button becomes visible. Edit and Delete buttons are hidden.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Edit button clicked.

    • onFieldEntered

      public void onFieldEntered(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      When the enter key is pressed while the focus is in a TextField, calls the save button.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Enter key pressed

    • onHomeClicked

      public void onHomeClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      When the Home Button is pressed, opens the Home window and closes the current Customer window.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Home Button pressed
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error opening the Home FXML File.

    • onNewClicked

      public void onNewClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Clears and enables editable fields and sets newInProcess to true.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - New Button clicked.

    • onSaveClicked

      public void onSaveClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      When the Save Button is clicked, performs input validation. If fields pass input validation tests, a new Customer is added to the SQL Database. Input validation checks that all fields are entered.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Save Button is clicked.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception thrown is error in SQL statement or parameters.

    • open

      public void open() throws IOException
      Opens a new Customer window. Called by other controllers.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception thrown if the FXML file cannot be loaded or found.

    • setEditInProcess

      public void setEditInProcess(boolean editInProcess)
      Sets the editInProcess field to true or false.
      Parameters:
      editInProcess - Boolean value to set editInProcess

    • setEditCustomer

      public static void setEditCustomer(Customer customer)
      Sets a Customer object to the editCustomer. Used prior to saving a new or edited Customer
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer object to be assigned to editCustomer.

    • setSelectedCustomer

      public static void setSelectedCustomer(Customer customer)
      Set a Customer object to the selectedCustomer. Used upon selecting a Customer in the table.
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer object to be assigned to selectedCustomer.

    • setFields

      public void setFields(Customer customer)
      Populates fields with information from a Customer object.
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer object to set fields.

    • setNewInProcess

      public void setNewInProcess(boolean newInProcess)
      Sets whether a new customer is being entered.
      Parameters:
      newInProcess - true if new has been clicked and customer not saved, otherwise false.

    • startNewCustomer

      public void startNewCustomer()
      Starts a new Customer entry by enabling and clearing fields. Save is the only visible Button. New Customer is not added to the database until Save is clicked and fields pass input validation.
